name: Denis Akhmerov
background: Denis Akhmerov is an experienced Program Manager in the automotive industry with a strong foundation in software development, project management, and team leadership. He began his career as a Software Developer specializing in advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS), working with major OEMs and Tier 1 companies on complex topics such as lidar-based road shape detection and functional safety compliance. Transitioning to project management, Denis has successfully led cross-functional teams across multiple countries, managing over 80 FTEs and delivering innovative ADAS functionalities. His expertise includes strategic opportunity development, customer-centric approaches, and effective communication across diverse teams. Denis is passionate about advancing automotive technology, particularly in safety and innovation, and is dedicated to shaping the future of driving.
potential_questions: Can you describe your experience with managing cross-functional teams in different geographical locations?
How do you ensure compliance with functional safety standards in automotive projects?
What strategies do you use to identify and develop opportunities in project management?
